author: Josh Gerstein
title: Judges balk at mass release of California prisoners over virus danger
description: But a panel’s ruling leaves the door open to cutting the prison population if the state doesn’t mitigate the threat from the coronavirus.
content: Any constitutional violation in Defendants current response to the COVID-19 crisis is different, in both nature and degree, from the violations underlying the 2009 population cap order, the courts decision said. That order was never intended to prepare Defend… [+1820 chars]
